title: WTB low grade T206 Hindu, Uzit and Lenox
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB low grade T206 Hindu, Uzit and Lenox
posts.post_content:
Looking for a Pr-Gd example of a Red hindu, brown hindu, uzit and lenox to complete my back set minus the cobb back..

Please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have one for sale.

thanks
jamie
There are a couple red hindus on e-bay right now.

Not to be a jerk or anything, but why do people suggest eBay when people post WTBs in the B/S/T? I'm pretty sure that is the least helpful suggestion possible.  We all know eBay exists. Everyone looks there before posting here...geesh.

Anyway, Jamie, I've got two separate Lenoxs, both PSA 2s. PM me if interested.
Sorry for trying to help out...man oh man.

Not to cause a stir on the BST Board, but I agree with Easy.
JP, the next time you feel the need to start a post with "not to be jerk or anything", how about just skipping that line in your post.  That way you can be sure you are not being a jerk or anything.
Nice work on being an a** to a guy that doesn't post very much.

Hope all is well,
Bob

Maybe he shouldn't post then. I'm 100% sure Jamie didn't appreciate the suggestion. And I know of at least 2 or 3 others who have complained. When people post WTBs in the BST, people shouldn't suggest looking on eBay. It is not helpful.

I am sorry I wasted your precious time by forcing you to read my post.  Of course, you had cards to sell him.
You are right about one thing, I won't post again.

guys can we get back on focus here.. im looking for hindus :)

JP please send me the scan of the ones you have and let me know how much.

anyone else with an Uzit or Lenox or Red hindu I am in the market..


Jamie
